sentences.sContent: They became more vociferous, and some of them began calling out what they thought of Hanna.
sentences.sContent_eng: They became more vociferous, and some of them began calling out what they thought of Hanna.
sentences.sCn: 他们变得更加吵闹了，一些人开始叫嚷着对汉娜的看法。

sentences.sContent: And one by one, encouraged by vociferous applause, speaking with fire and enthusiasm and excited gestures, they replied to the attack.
sentences.sContent_eng: And one by one, encouraged by vociferous applause, speaking with fire and enthusiasm and excited gestures, they replied to the attack.
sentences.sCn: 他们一个个受到喧闹的欢呼鼓掌的鼓励，怀着火焰和激情，打着激动的手势，回答了对他们的攻击。

synos.tran: 大声叫的；喊叫的，喧嚷的
